S.FORM: u nu binacadan a kamu nu kitakid ayza a demiad 世界母語日 nilacul (1)baymihecaan tusa a bulad tusa a bataan izaw ku cacay ayza.u nu binacadan a kamu nu kitakid ayza a demiad, kanca a musakamu tu nu uzipay nu banacadan a kamu (2)ayza musakamu kaku tu kamu nu Sakizaya (3)musakamu tu kisu tu binacadan haw?

o no binacadan a kamo no kitakid ayza a demiad 世界母語日 nilacol (1)baymihecaan tosa a bolad tosa a bataan izaw ko cacay ayza.o no binacadan a kamo no kitakid ayza a demiad, kanca a mosakamo to no ozipay no banacadan a kamo (2)ayza mosakamo kako to kamo no Sakizaya (3)mosakamo to kiso to binacadan haw?
